comment: I made this one day for my friend's birthday : )
I remember being inspired by Mild High Club when I made this

Boy Pablo was all up in my youtube suggested during this time, so I gave in one day and checked them out. I thought they made fun, lighthearted jams, so I wanted to see if I could keep it simple and record something in that style
I believe this was to test playing the same background part on guitar and bass
I submitted this when I applied for UCLA Radio haha-- also partly inspired by Mild High Club. I also know I wanted that crunchy sound, though this could have done with any sort of mixing
video game type jam embracing virtual instruments! I love putting delay on electronic drums for that tactile pitter patter effect

When I made this little thing, my goal was to break out of the hole of looping that I often fall into and build something up little by little. I enjoyed incorporating some noise into this one for old videogame-style percussion
